inputXml:
<filter>
                <primarySelector>
                <targetEntity>org.meveo.model.billing.BillingAccount</targetEntity>
                <alias>ba</alias>
                <displayFields>
                  <field>code</field>
                  <field>statusDate</field>
                  <field>email</field>
                  <field>nextInvoiceDate</field>
                </displayFields>
                <exportFields/>
                <ignoreIfNotFoundForeignKeys/>
              </primarySelector>
              <secondarySelectors/>
              <disabled>false</disabled>
              <appendGeneratedCode>false</appendGeneratedCode>
              <filterCondition class="andCompositeFilterCondition">
                <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_AND</filterConditionType>
                <filterConditions>
                    <filterCondition class="orCompositeFilterCondition">
                        <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_OR</filterConditionType>
                        <filterConditions>
                              <primitiveFilterCondition>
                                <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                                <fieldName>statusDate</fieldName>
                                <operator>=</operator>
                                <operand>cfDate:BILLING_ACCOUNT_STATUS_DATE</operand>
                              </primitiveFilterCondition>
                        </filterConditions>
                    </filterCondition>
                        <filterCondition class="orCompositeFilterCondition">
                        <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_OR</filterConditionType>
                        <filterConditions>
                            <primitiveFilterCondition>
                                <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                                <fieldName>email</fieldName>
                                <operator>LIKE</operator>
                                <operand>cfString:BILLING_ACCOUNT_EMAIL</operand>
                              </primitiveFilterCondition>
                        </filterConditions>
                    </filterCondition>
                    <filterCondition class="orCompositeFilterCondition">
                        <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_OR</filterConditionType>
                        <filterConditions>
                              <primitiveFilterCondition>
                                <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                                <fieldName>customerAccount</fieldName>
                                <operator>=</operator>
                                <operand>cfEntity:BILLING_ACCOUNT_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT</operand>
                                <className>org.meveo.model.payments.CustomerAccount</className>
                                <label>Customer Account</label>
                              </primitiveFilterCondition>
                        </filterConditions>
                    </filterCondition>
                        <filterCondition class="orCompositeFilterCondition">
                        <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_OR</filterConditionType>
                        <filterConditions>
                              <primitiveFilterCondition>
                                <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                                <fieldName>brAmountWithTax</fieldName>
                                <operator>=</operator>
                                <operand>cfDecimal:BILLING_ACCOUNT_AMOUNT_WITH_TAX</operand>
                              </primitiveFilterCondition>
                        </filterConditions>
                    </filterCondition>
                </filterConditions>
              </filterCondition>
          </filter>
